questions.question: In the context of this experiment, what is the role of the 'master' process in MPI?
options: It distributes the work to worker processes and gathers the results.
It only stores the final result.
It is not used in this experiment.
questions.answer: It distributes the work to worker processes and gathers the results.

questions.question: What does 'scalability' mean in the context of parallel computing?
options: The ability of a system to handle an increasing amount of work by adding resources.
The speed of a single processor.
The total memory of the system.
The number of programming languages supported.
questions.answer: The ability of a system to handle an increasing amount of work by adding resources.
